Description: ForestGEO site name (cfull site name or abbreviated)
Plant family name revised in Taxonomic Name Resolution Services (TNRS), an online free tool for correcting and standardizing plant names.

Plant specific name or epithet. When referring to a plant in a genus if the individual was not identified at the speices level, we use 'sp.' If an epithet is precedeed by the letter 'x' it indicates an hybrid form (i.e. Tilia x europaea)
Plant name as used by Forestgeo sites (names corrected here using TNRS, when neccesary)
Species code used at the ForestGEO site, variable per site, even if representing same species.
Common growth form for a given plant species
Informative notes, sometimes critical for biomass calculation
